Package com.telenav.kivakit.interfaces.messaging

Interface Transmitter

public interface Transmitter
A transmitter of values with similar function to a Source, or a Supplier.

If the isTransmitting() method returns true, then a call to transmit(Transmittable) will result in a call to onTransmit(Transmittable).

Author:
jonathanl (shibo)
